text: Are there any resources for coding email templates in hubl? looks like they take away css and js functionality, so it's not really clear how to style content...
Most of the stuff I can find online seems to be geared towards making websites

Does anyone know a way to combine both blog listings and HubDB listings?

My client wants to build a resource page that also includes blogs that can be filtered by tags.

So if the website visitor filters by Product-Category A, all content offers, as well as, blogs with the same tag will show in the filtered results.
